title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1276.2 - Entry into terminal restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1276.2 - Entry into terminal restricted

State Regulations

Since the presence in or upon the air terminal of a tank
vehicle is likely to endanger persons or property in or upon the air terminal
and render the use of the air terminal unsafe, no tank vehicle shall be allowed
in or upon the air terminal unless it shall conform to the rules and
regulations set forth in this Part in addition to all other rules and
regulations for the use of the air terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1276.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
